edge: Trevante Rhodes portrays the character of Adult Chiron, also known as 'Black', in the movie.
Alex R. Hibbert plays the role of Child Chiron, also known as 'Little'.
Ashton Sanders enacts the character of Teen Chiron.
Jaden Piner portrays Child Kevin in the movie.
Jharrel Jerome enacts the character of Teen Kevin.
Trevante Rhodes and André Holland portray Adult Chiron and Adult Kevin, respectively. The actors playing the adult versions of Chiron and Kevin have romantic interest in each other.
Naomie Harris plays the role of Paula, who is also known as Chiron's drug addict mother.
Mahershala Ali portrays Juan, a drug dealer who becomes a father figure to Chiron.
Janelle Monáe plays the role of Teresa, who is also known as Juan's girlfriend.
Patrick Decile portrays the character of Terrel, a school bully in the movie.
